was quite an enjoyable grand adventure after all.\""},{"lineNumber":179593,"originalJapaneseLine":"地上に向かってブレイブ号が掘り進む。","translatedEnglishLine":"The Brave ship dug forward toward the surface."},{"lineNumber":179594,"originalJapaneseLine":"東芝が真剣な表情でぽつりと呟いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Toshiba muttered quietly with a serious expression."},{"lineNumber":179595,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ご先祖様の言葉、本当だったんだなあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Our ancestor's words were truly real...\""},

{"lineNumber":179596,"originalJapaneseLine":"ブレイブ号が地上を目指して進む。","translatedEnglishLine":"The Brave continued moving toward the surface."},

{"lineNumber":179597,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーは先ほどの","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurukku recalled the earlier"},

{"lineNumber":179598,"originalJapaneseLine":"天界での一幕を思い出していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"scene in the heavenly realm."},

{"lineNumber":179599,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ウィリスさんはランスが向かった先にいるのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"(Willis said that the one Rance headed toward is"},

{"lineNumber":179600,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一級神だと言っていた）","translatedEnglishLine":"a first-class god.)"},

{"lineNumber":179601,"originalJapaneseLine":"（そしてランスは、","translatedEnglishLine":"(And Rance,"},

{"lineNumber":179602,"originalJapaneseLine":"　神とセックスをした、と……）","translatedEnglishLine":"he had sex with a god...) "},

{"lineNumber":179603,"originalJapaneseLine":"（まさか、本当に……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(No way, really...)"},

{"lineNumber":179604,"originalJapaneseLine":"（……いえ）","translatedEnglishLine":"(...No.)"},

{"lineNumber":179605,"originalJapaneseLine":"（不可能ですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"(It's impossible."},

{"lineNumber":179606,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間に一級神を襲うことなど……","translatedEnglishLine":"A human attacking a first-class god..."},

{"lineNumber":179607,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まして、それが成功するなど）","translatedEnglishLine":"Let alone succeeding in doing so.)"},

{"lineNumber":179608,"originalJapaneseLine":"（一級と言えば、女神ALICEと同格の存在）","translatedEnglishLine":"(First-class means an existence on par with the goddess ALICE.)"},

{"lineNumber":179609,"originalJapaneseLine":"（普通の人間なら、","translatedEnglishLine":"(For an ordinary human,"},

{"lineNumber":179610,"originalJapaneseLine":"　目にしただけで萎縮して何も出来ないはず）","translatedEnglishLine":"just seeing one would cause them to shrink back and be unable to do anything.)"},

{"lineNumber":179611,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははははは！　がんがん進めー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahaha! Keep pushing forward!\""},

{"lineNumber":179612,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じ〜〜〜〜〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Stare~~~~...\""},

{"lineNumber":179613,"originalJapaneseLine":"（…………）","translatedEnglishLine":"(........)"},

{"lineNumber":179614,"originalJapaneseLine":"（……いえいえ、ないですね）","translatedEnglishLine":"(...No, no, it can't be.)"},

{"lineNumber":179615,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んあ？　なんだ、クルックー、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm? What's the matter, Kurukku,"},

{"lineNumber":179616,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人の顔をじろじろと見おって」","translatedEnglishLine":"staring at someone's face like that?\""},

{"lineNumber":179617,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、別に」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, nothing in particular.\" "},

{"lineNumber":179618,"originalJapaneseLine":"（でも、きっと、ランスは女神ALICEも","translatedEnglishLine":"(But surely, Rance wouldn't fear the goddess ALICE either.)"},

{"lineNumber":179619,"originalJapaneseLine":"　恐れはしないでしょう）","translatedEnglishLine":""},

{"lineNumber":179620,"originalJapaneseLine":"（…………）","translatedEnglishLine":"(......)"},

{"lineNumber":179621,"originalJapaneseLine":"（もしかしたら、いつか……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Maybe, someday...)"},

{"lineNumber":179622,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　クルックーさん、どうかしました？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"? Kurukku-san, is something wrong?\""},

{"lineNumber":179623,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、何も考えていません」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, I'm not thinking about anything.\""},{"lineNumber":179624,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"??\""},{"lineNumber":179625,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":179626,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが司令部を覗きに来ると、","translatedEnglishLine":"When Rance came to peek into the command center,"},{"lineNumber":179627,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこはいつも通り戦場さながらの騒がしさだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"it was as noisy as usual, like a battlefield."},{"lineNumber":179628,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ツングース平原で行われた戦闘は終了しました。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The battle on the Tungus Plain has ended."},{"lineNumber":179629,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔軍は撃退しましたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army was repelled,"},{"lineNumber":179630,"originalJapaneseLine":"　防衛軍は二割の死傷兵を出した模様！」","translatedEnglishLine":"but the defense forces suffered about 20% casualties!\""},{"lineNumber":179631,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リーザスから連絡がありました。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There was a message from Rizas."},{"lineNumber":179632,"originalJapaneseLine":"　東部で発生していた反乱は鎮圧に成功。","translatedEnglishLine":"The rebellion that broke out in the east has been successfully suppressed."},{"lineNumber":179633,"originalJapaneseLine":"　心配無用とのことです！」","translatedEnglishLine":"There is no need to worry!\""},{"lineNumber":179634,"originalJapaneseLine":"「相変わらずここは忙しそうだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's still busy here as always.\""},{"lineNumber":179635,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それと、世界も相変わらず目茶苦茶だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And the world is still in chaos.\""},{"lineNumber":179636,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ゼス王国から定時報告あり。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There is a regular report from the Kingdom of Zeth."},{"lineNumber":179637,"originalJapaneseLine":"　マジノライン方面に数万の魔軍が追加された模様。","translatedEnglishLine":"Several tens of thousands of demon troops appear to have been added to the Maginot Line area."},{"lineNumber":179638,"originalJapaneseLine":"　尚、各戦線に大きな動きはありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"However, there is no major movement on any other front.\""},{"lineNumber":179639,"originalJapaneseLine":"「自由都市より報告。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Report from the Free City."},{"lineNumber":179640,"originalJapaneseLine":"　西部のリーザス国境付近の魔軍の総数ですが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Regarding the total number of demon troops near the western border of Rizas,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス様ぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ra-Rance-sama..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この件について深く考えるのはやめましょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's stop thinking too deeply about this matter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達も忘れた方が良いかと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think it would be better for us to forget it as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いえ、私達に出来るのは、それだけ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, what we can do is only that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、言った方がいいですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's probably the better way to put it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね、私もそう思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right, I think so too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そうと決まったら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-If that's decided,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冒険はもう切り上げて地上に戻りましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let's wrap up the adventure and return to the surface."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みんなも、それでいいですよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Everyone, that's okay with you, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰も彼もが、同じような表情を浮かべて頷いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone showed similar expressions and nodded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、いいか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, it's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中々楽しい大冒険だったしな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was quite an enjoyable grand adventure after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地上に向かってブレイブ号が掘り進む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Brave ship dug forward toward the surface.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 東芝が真剣な表情でぽつりと呟いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Toshiba muttered quietly with a serious expression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご先祖様の言葉、本当だったんだなあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Our ancestor's words were truly real..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブレイブ号が地上を目指して進む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Brave continued moving toward the surface.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーは先ほどの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukku recalled the earlier

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天界での一幕を思い出していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: scene in the heavenly realm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ウィリスさんはランスが向かった先にいるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Willis said that the one Rance headed toward is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一級神だと言っていた）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a first-class god.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （そしてランスは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (And Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 神とセックスをした、と……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he had sex with a god...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （まさか、本当に……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (No way, really...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （不可能ですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (It's impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間に一級神を襲うことなど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A human attacking a first-class god...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まして、それが成功するなど）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let alone succeeding in doing so.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （一級と言えば、女神ALICEと同格の存在）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (First-class means an existence on par with the goddess ALICE.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （普通の人間なら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (For an ordinary human,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目にしただけで萎縮して何も出来ないはず）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just seeing one would cause them to shrink back and be unable to do anything.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははははは！　がんがん進めー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahahahaha! Keep pushing forward!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （……いえいえ、ないですね）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (...No, no, it can't be.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んあ？　なんだ、クルックー、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm? What's the matter, Kurukku,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人の顔をじろじろと見おって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: staring at someone's face like that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、別に」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, nothing in particular."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （でも、きっと、ランスは女神ALICEも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (But surely, Rance wouldn't fear the goddess ALICE either.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐れはしないでしょう）
（もしかしたら、いつか……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Maybe, someday...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「？　クルックーさん、どうかしました？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "? Kurukku-san, is something wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、何も考えていません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I'm not thinking about anything."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが司令部を覗きに来ると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance came to peek into the command center,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこはいつも通り戦場さながらの騒がしさだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was as noisy as usual, like a battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ツングース平原で行われた戦闘は終了しました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The battle on the Tungus Plain has ended.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は撃退しましたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army was repelled,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 防衛軍は二割の死傷兵を出した模様！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the defense forces suffered about 20% casualties!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザスから連絡がありました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There was a message from Rizas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 東部で発生していた反乱は鎮圧に成功。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The rebellion that broke out in the east has been successfully suppressed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心配無用とのことです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no need to worry!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「相変わらずここは忙しそうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's still busy here as always."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それと、世界も相変わらず目茶苦茶だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And the world is still in chaos."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ゼス王国から定時報告あり。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There is a regular report from the Kingdom of Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジノライン方面に数万の魔軍が追加された模様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several tens of thousands of demon troops appear to have been added to the Maginot Line area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 尚、各戦線に大きな動きはありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, there is no major movement on any other front."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自由都市より報告。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Report from the Free City.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 西部のリーザス国境付近の魔軍の総数ですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Regarding the total number of demon troops near the western border of Rizas,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス様ぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ra-Rance-sama..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この件について深く考えるのはやめましょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's stop thinking too deeply about this matter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達も忘れた方が良いかと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think it would be better for us to forget it as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いえ、私達に出来るのは、それだけ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, what we can do is only that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、言った方がいいですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's probably the better way to put it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね、私もそう思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right, I think so too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そうと決まったら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-If that's decided,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冒険はもう切り上げて地上に戻りましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let's wrap up the adventure and return to the surface."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みんなも、それでいいですよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Everyone, that's okay with you, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰も彼もが、同じような表情を浮かべて頷いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone showed similar expressions and nodded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、いいか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, it's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中々楽しい大冒険だったしな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was quite an enjoyable grand adventure after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地上に向かってブレイブ号が掘り進む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Brave ship dug forward toward the surface.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 東芝が真剣な表情でぽつりと呟いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Toshiba muttered quietly with a serious expression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご先祖様の言葉、本当だったんだなあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Our ancestor's words were truly real..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブレイブ号が地上を目指して進む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Brave continued moving toward the surface.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーは先ほどの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukku recalled the earlier

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天界での一幕を思い出していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: scene in the heavenly realm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ウィリスさんはランスが向かった先にいるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Willis said that the one Rance headed toward is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一級神だと言っていた）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a first-class god.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （そしてランスは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (And Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 神とセックスをした、と……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he had sex with a god...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （まさか、本当に……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (No way, really...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （不可能ですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (It's impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間に一級神を襲うことなど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A human attacking a first-class god...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まして、それが成功するなど）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let alone succeeding in doing so.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （一級と言えば、女神ALICEと同格の存在）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (First-class means an existence on par with the goddess ALICE.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （普通の人間なら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (For an ordinary human,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目にしただけで萎縮して何も出来ないはず）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just seeing one would cause them to shrink back and be unable to do anything.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははははは！　がんがん進めー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahahahaha! Keep pushing forward!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （……いえいえ、ないですね）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (...No, no, it can't be.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んあ？　なんだ、クルックー、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm? What's the matter, Kurukku,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人の顔をじろじろと見おって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: staring at someone's face like that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、別に」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, nothing in particular."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （でも、きっと、ランスは女神ALICEも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (But surely, Rance wouldn't fear the goddess ALICE either.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐れはしないでしょう）
（もしかしたら、いつか……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Maybe, someday...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「？　クルックーさん、どうかしました？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "? Kurukku-san, is something wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、何も考えていません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I'm not thinking about anything."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが司令部を覗きに来ると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance came to peek into the command center,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこはいつも通り戦場さながらの騒がしさだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was as noisy as usual, like a battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ツングース平原で行われた戦闘は終了しました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The battle on the Tungus Plain has ended.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は撃退しましたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army was repelled,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 防衛軍は二割の死傷兵を出した模様！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the defense forces suffered about 20% casualties!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザスから連絡がありました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There was a message from Rizas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 東部で発生していた反乱は鎮圧に成功。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The rebellion that broke out in the east has been successfully suppressed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心配無用とのことです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no need to worry!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「相変わらずここは忙しそうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's still busy here as always."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それと、世界も相変わらず目茶苦茶だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And the world is still in chaos."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ゼス王国から定時報告あり。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There is a regular report from the Kingdom of Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジノライン方面に数万の魔軍が追加された模様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several tens of thousands of demon troops appear to have been added to the Maginot Line area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 尚、各戦線に大きな動きはありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, there is no major movement on any other front."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自由都市より報告。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Report from the Free City.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 西部のリーザス国境付近の魔軍の総数ですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Regarding the total number of demon troops near the western border of Rizas,
